overview:
Keith Fiore is Co-founder & CEO of zenplaya, a smart mobile service that makes it easy to discover treasure in the offline world.

Previously, Keith served as Founder & CEO of 2aTEE Golf Media, a place-based media company that manages static & digital networks at golf courses & practice centers nationwide. Clients included American Express, Verizon, General Motors, Chase, Allstate, Sprint, Fidelity, and Puma.

Prior to founding 2aTEE, Keith worked at Clear Channel & Grey Advertising.
